alert.note: Alert for Cherokee; Spartanburg (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued October 20 at 2:56PM EDT until October 20 at 3:30PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: The National Weather Service in Greenville-Spartanburg has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Rutherford County in western North Carolina... Southeastern Polk County in western North Carolina... Southwestern Cleveland County in the Piedmont of North Carolina... North central Spartanburg County in Upstate South Carolina... Northwestern Cherokee County in Upstate South Carolina... * Until 330 PM EDT. * At 256 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Rutherfordton to 9 miles southwest of Forest City to 5 miles east of Columbus, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Forest City, Spindale, Chesnee, Ellenboro, Lattimore, Mooresboro, Bostic, Cliffside, Henrietta, and Harris. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please report damaging winds, hail, or flooding to the National Weather Service by calling toll free, 1, 800, 2 6 7, 8 1 0 1, or by posting on our Facebook page, or Tweet it using hashtag nwsgsp. Your message should describe the event and the specific location where it occurred.
